---
title: "About"
---


StatChat is an informal but informative get-together of local statistics educators. 

<br /><br />

## Current Organizers

StatChat is currently being organized by  [Laura Le](mailto:free0312@umn.edu?subject=StatChat) (University of Minnesota), [Chelsey Legacy](mailto:legac006@umn.edu?subject=StatChat) (University of Minnesota),  [Amelia McNamara](mailto:amelia.mcnamara@stthomas.edu?subject=StatChat) (University of St Thomas), and [Andrew Zieffler](mailto:zief0002@umn.edu?subject=StatChat) (University of Minnesota).

## Original Organizers

StatChat was originally conceived by Joan Garfield (University of Minnesota), Danny Kaplan (Macalester College), and Julie Legler (St. Olaf) circa 2005.
